trans-unit.source: Specifies that the property can be used as an application setting.
trans-unit.target: Angir at egenskapen kan brukes som en applikasjonsinnstilling.

trans-unit.source: Properties that are marked with the RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute set to `true` display when you expand the **ConfigurableProperties** line in the **Properties** window.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som er merket med RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute satt til `true` vises når du utvide den **ConfigurableProperties** linje i den **Egenskaper** vinduet.

trans-unit.source: A property that has no recommended setting or that is marked with RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute set to `false` is not shown and is an unlikely candidate for being an application setting.
trans-unit.target: En egenskap som har ingen anbefalte innstillinger eller som er merket med RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute satt til `false` vises ikke og er et lite sannsynlig candidate for å være en applikasjonsinnstilling.

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Standard `false`.

trans-unit.source: You can bind a property that does not have a RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute to a setting in Visual Studio by clicking the ellipsis button (…) under **Settings** in the **Properties** window and selecting the appropriate property from the list.
trans-unit.target: Du kan binde en egenskap som ikke har en RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute til en innstilling i Visual Studio ved å klikke ellipsen (...) under **innstillinger** i den **Egenskaper** vinduet og velge riktig egenskap fra listen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you mark a property with RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute set to `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.Yes>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du merker en egenskap med RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute satt til `true`, verdien for dette attributtet er satt til medlemmet konstant <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.Yes>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.Yes>

trans-unit.source: For a property marked with RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute set to value `false`, the value is <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.No>.
trans-unit.target: For en egenskap som er merket med RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute verdi `false`, verdien er <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.No>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.No>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check the value of this attribute in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.No?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor når du vil kontrollere verdien til attributtet i koden, må du angi attributtet som <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.No?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.No?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [attributter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property this attribute is bound to can be used as an application setting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egenskapen dette attributtet er bundet til kan brukes som en applikasjonsinnstilling; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute"></xref>, which is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.No"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdien for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute"> </xref>, som <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute.No"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref> feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
trans-unit.target: Angir om denne forekomsten og et angitt objekt er like.

trans-unit.source: Another object to compare to.
trans-unit.target: Et annet objekt til å sammenligne.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis obj er lik denne forekomsten; ellers, .

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer hashkoden for denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En hash-kode for gjeldende <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the value of this instance is the default value for the class.
trans-unit.target: Angir om verdien for denne forekomsten er standardverdien for klassen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this instance is the default attribute for the class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne forekomsten er standardattributtet for klassen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property cannot be used as an application setting.
trans-unit.target: Angir at en egenskap ikke kan brukes som en applikasjonsinnstilling.

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref> feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: This field is the default setting for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet er standardinnstillingen for dette attributtet.

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute> set to `false`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member No.
trans-unit.target: Når du merker en egenskap med <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute>satt til `false`, verdien for dette attributtet er satt til medlemmet konstant Nei</xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute No.
trans-unit.target: Derfor når du vil kontrollere om attributtet er satt til denne verdien i koden, må du angi attributtet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the property this attribute is bound to can be used as an application setting.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om egenskapen dette attributtet er bundet til kan bare brukes som en applikasjonsinnstilling.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property this attribute is bound to can be used as an application setting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egenskapen dette attributtet er bundet til kan brukes som en applikasjonsinnstilling; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property can be used as an application setting.
trans-unit.target: Angir at en egenskap kan brukes som en applikasjonsinnstilling.

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref> feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute> set to `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member Yes.
trans-unit.target: Når du merker en egenskap med <xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute>satt til `true`, verdien for dette attributtet er satt til medlemmet konstant Ja.</xref:System.ComponentModel.RecommendedAsConfigurableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as Yes.
trans-unit.target: Når du vil kontrollere om attributtet er satt til denne verdien i koden, må du derfor angi attributtet som Ja.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
